title: Coloring Book
description: First of all I would like to thank you for purchasing this book. The book “Coloring Book (Vegetables Coloring Book For Children)” is designed by "Hilda Flowers", especially for kids/children of age group 0-9 years. I(Hilda Flowers) love drawing and sketching, and so I planned to create books for kids, with which they can not only learn something, but also enjoy it. So, I am now going to create coloring books for children. In this your child will learn about various vegetables and can fill appropriate color in the vegetables images given in the book. I have designed other Coloring books as well for kids, you can find them online by searching for "Coloring Book By Hilda Flowers". I am sure your kid will enjoy these books.
author: Hilda Flowers
